website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Highlight MC is an affordable cleat that is comfortable and feels fast on the field. Unfortunately, it seems that these speed cleats from Under Armour are only designed for narrow-footers. Owners are complaining that the cleats are uncomfortably narrow. Aside from that, the heel piece also causes blisters and the outsole easily scuffs. Overall, the UA Highlight MC is a good speed cleat as long as you can get the right fit and you can live with the scuff marks.
pros: A good number of owners enjoy playing in these low-top football cleats
They say that the UA Spotlight MC is a good cleat for its price
These Under Armour football cleats are quite comfortable to wear, many buyers comment
The upper is quite durable and flexible, a handful of owners observe
According to a few players, the Under Armour Spotlight MC has good traction
A reviewer even claims that these UA cleats have better traction than the Adizero 7.0
The Spotlight MC feels fast and stable, some users exclaim
These low-top football cleats provide exceptional lockdown, a few users declare
cons: These Under Armour cleats are uncomfortably narrow, a good number of buyers gripe
A lot of players are complaining that the heel piece causes terrible blisters
They claim that they switched to a different football cleat to let their blisters heal
Many owners are disappointed that the outsole easily scuffs
They are saying that the coating comes off as soon as you step on the field

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Spotlight Mc new line.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are specially made for football. Perfectly fit on the leg. It is convenient in them. But they have one drawback, they are smaller by 0.5 or 1 size in their dimensional grid. My standard size is 10.5. I bought my size, but it turned out they were small to me. I had to order 1 size larger. Now I got 11.5 and they are excellent for me. I am disappointed with the time spent, but I am satisfied with the quality of the shoes in general.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleat
customer_reviews.text: Son is using for football - great cleat, but don't expect the chrome on the cleats to last ... 15 minutes in the turf and the majority of the chrome rubbed off.
customer_reviews.author: Gail C.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleat
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year old son uses these for competitive football and lacrosse. He loves the tight sock-like fit and feel. They are not stretching out like some others have. He dislikes how fast the silver on the bottom of the cleats came off- totally gone after about 2 weeks of heavy use. We know the silver isn’t what’s important but it was part of what attracted him to the cleat so worth mentioning. Price was better than some similar Nike’s.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Holliday

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look but back heel has continuous blister from the way the heel is made.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara Atienza

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Worn one football practice in grass and several of the cleats broken off and a lot of the silver warn off. Definitely not worth the money. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shownuff

customer_reviews.title: UA White cleats
customer_reviews.text: My son plays varsity football he ordered the size he normally wears and it fit perfectly! The price was much and I did find it cheaper some where else BUT Amy som wanted the clear so we kept it! He plays in this show every Friday night and says they are light and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obviously they are good enough for me to keep them
customer_reviews.text: These cleats are definitely a 1/2 size too short. My kid wears an 11 (I bought an 11) and they do not fit. I wear a 10.5 and they fit me perfectly. I'm keeping the short size for me and ordering the 11.5 for him. Obviously they are good enough for me to keep them.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: No Idea How a Foot Gets in These Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My son couldn't get his foot 1/2 way in with the way these shoes are made. Had to return them. Way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Esteves

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. My son started to used them as soon as we received them. First day got a Heel blister but by the third use shoes are perfectly broken in. They are just little smaller than expected, plan on getting half number bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Perez

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleats
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, they were super sharp, and they fit his foot like a glove!!!
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: OL/LB/TE... Stay Away! Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Way Too Small For Lineman Or Tight Ends, Stay Away Big Guys!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Osburn

customer_reviews.title: Too much heat from sole
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of shoe conducts heat from hot turf! Despite how cool looking they are - my son needs something else. Heel also very tight
customer_reviews.author: Letisa Alkhaddam

customer_reviews.title: Blisters on the heel instantly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, arrived promptly but the back of the shoe and the fabric are shaped in such a way that they dig into the heel badly. My son has tried to break them in for over a month without success. He had to use them with moleskin down the back of his heels to minimize the friction. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: amy atwood

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Super light, comfortable, fit as expected. Highly recommend. A very nice low-cut cleat.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son due to looks and price. So cheap I bought 2 pair so if they don’t hold up this summer we have another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son bought TWO pairs for football!!
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes them. Bought 9.5 and wanted another color so we ordered 1/2 size up for the next pair. He likes them a lot. Different brands different sizes.... he’s 9.5-10 and the 10 were bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Q.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, saved money by purchasing from Amazon vs big box sporting goods stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Don’t worry
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is good itself but whatever under armor is adding in the back of the cleats are messing it up there’s a hard metal or cardboard in the back of the heel and it’s super uncomfortable thinking of throwing them away I thought they would be better they really needa fix these cleats
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, flashy color, not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes for my son who plays high school football. He loves the snug fit, but they were difficult to break in. His right heel developed bad blisters until they were broken in. Recommend ordering wide fit.
customer_reviews.author: kuluave

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Chrome bottom doesn't last long, but it says that on the product. Just thought it would be longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Heal Cup Causes Nasty Blisters
customer_reviews.text: They tore up my heals so bad. It's been 2 weeks now, and they're just healing up enough to wear shoes again. Even though they have amazing fit, the poorly sculpted heel cup ruins them. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Procopio

customer_reviews.title: Gave me blisters
customer_reviews.text: It gave me blisters the first time I used it
customer_reviews.author: Foki808

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: came as expected and son loves them...they fit perfectly and are comfortable to wear everyday
customer_reviews.author: susan bailey

customer_reviews.title: tight around the ankle without lacing, Need more width towards did the base of the foot. .
customer_reviews.text: extremely tight around the ankle without lacing, Need more wide width towards the base of the foot. even with larger size it was not comfortable 🙁 returned asap
customer_reviews.author: Tara Good

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the chance to wear them yet. I will update with more results. They fit well and look as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cleats
customer_reviews.text: The are a little tight but my son loves them
customer_reviews.author: Lynlee

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit of these cleats. They fit exactly as shown and have great flexibility and feel strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Scott Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Very light cleat
customer_reviews.text: My 15 y.o. has had these cleats for two seasons and absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: comfort of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: my son was extremely happy when we got the product right on time and it was exactly how the description said the show would be.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Bad blistering
customer_reviews.text: Blisters formed very quickly while wearing these cleats. Although they look fancy I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Football
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these cleats & his dad & I can spot him anywhere on the field in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Designed for greatness
customer_reviews.text: Gift for a very talented Athlete (my grandson) He is extremely pleased with design and fit. Only time will tell how well his team does.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Awful!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage!!! Feet hurt, blisters and very narrow. Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Ordered NEW product and GOT USED Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these NEW for $110 and they show up USED!! Already laced up with dirt on one shoe and visibly worn and dirty bottoms! Unexceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I like the the look and the design of the cleats. I just don’t like the tightness around the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen jones

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these to one practice and got very severe blisters on both heels.
customer_reviews.author: MTmom

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Run small. I strongly suggest ordering a half size to a whole size up.
customer_reviews.author: aeivy21

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product - didn't even last one football season.
customer_reviews.text: Falling apart after only a few months. Terrible quality very disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: TS

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Spotlight Mc Lacrosse Shoe
product_meta.description: Woven upper provides a lightweight, sock-like fit, with woven-in TPU coated yarns for zonal stability & support. Full-length bootie construction with molded ankle collar for greater structure, extended support & a snug, comfortable fit. TPU heel unit & coating on toe box for enhanced protection & durability. High rebound SuperFoam insole provides optimal shock absorption & comfort. Ultra-lightweight speed plate combines BZM & TPU for incredible stability & strength. Strategically placed mixture of bladed & conical studs for improved braking ability, quick multi-directional movements & razor sharp cuts. Secondary cleats engage to provide an added bite for razor sharp cuts & explosive acceleration.
feature_bullets: Woven upper provides a lightweight, sock like fit, with woven in TPU coated yarns for zonal stability & support
Full length bootie construction with molded ankle collar for greater structure, extended support & a snug, comfortable fit
TPU heel unit & coating on toe box for enhanced protection & durability
High rebound SuperFoam insole provides optimal shock absorption & comfort
Ultra lightweight speed plate combines BZM & TPU for incredible stability & stre
